title: Perm Ban
body: You know what there was a time when trash talk was ok, and part of a competitive game.  I can't believe how pussified this generation is.  Why is there even a report feature? If someone gets on your nerves or hurts your feelings just simply mute them!  Why do you have to tell on them like a little cry baby?  Also why is perm ban even a thing?  If anything it should be perm ban from chat.  People spend their money, time, life on this game and then the company just perm bans if you talk trash?  Why don't they issue a refund in the money you spent how about that?  Can someone please answer my questions.

replies.body:
Read the terms of service.
You agreed
You broke the rules
You got banned

There is a huge difference between trash talking and flat out harassment. We dont have your chatlogs so we can only assume, but from what ive seen on these boards people like you seem to think trash talk is using derogatory/racial slurs, or telling people to kill themselves. Trash talking/small banter is ok, but there is a limit. Plus what does spending money have to do with you breaking the rules? You do realize this is normal right. The same could be said about basically any other aspect of life. You could go to a store and break the rules. But all that money you spent doesnt change the fact that you broke the rules and it ended up you getting ban from the store. Its the same thing here!

You guys sound like a bunch of cry babies.  Just mute the person if they are hurting your feelings.  Also by perm banning someone that doeskin stop them from creating another account an talking trash again.  If someone wants to be a dick they can be that simple.

You're the one creating this thread.

One could argue that you're whining about the rules that you agree to every time the game is patched. It's all a matter of perspective.

Hey, name call all you want here.

I'm happy with the standard of civility that is required. My account is safe.

In the end, these are the rules, and no matter how much you whine about how you don't like them it's not going to change. You either act with some civility or risk the consequences of not doing so.

If you don't like the rules you always have the option of playing a different game.
Can you suggest a game where everyone isnt a little bitch like you?
I hear DOTA 2 has lower standards of civility, feel free to go over there.

you post 1994 kids are horrible

Almost all people who are permabanned were warned beforehand (technically they all are in the terms of use, but I am talking about through restrictions and suspensions).

Nobody has been banned for a one time outburst unless they were using hate speech or racism.

Riot has tried something akin to perma chat ban on the past, in nearly all cases players turned to other forms of trolling.

As for why there are even punishments in the first place, it is because most people don't want to play with you. I don't have your logs to judge from, but it is probably because you are annoying and disrespectful. You are driving Riot's customers away, any for profit organization woulf be wise to kick you out.

They don't refund your money because you agreed that they would not be obligated to in this situation.

You had warnings and chances in the past to change your behavior, it isn't like this is out of nowhere. That, or you used hate speech.
You can troll in other ways.  I can create a new name an troll there too. There is no stopping someone if they want to be a dick.

True, but they can heavily dissuade you. 

In fact, I think you made another post in this thread asking for a suggestion of another game? Dissuasion successful.
